enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: This issue was first addressed by SBSTA in plenary on Tuesday, 7 December, and subsequently in informal consultations facilitated by Outi Berghäll (Finland) and Marcela Main (Chile).
Consultations aimed to address the role of the Joint Liaison Group (JLG) of the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD), the UN Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD) and the UNFCCC.
In plenary, on Tuesday, 14 December, SBSTA adopted conclusions.
